item.title: ‘God on our side’: Father fighting for his life after getting infected with flesh-eating bacteria
item.description: A father in Florida is fighting for his life after getting infected with a flesh-eating bacteria.

item.title: ASALH, What's next for black history in American history?

item.description: Death investigation closes Sunshine Skyway Bridge South Fishing Pier

item.title: FSU football player Ethan Pritchard identified as victim in Havana shooting
item.description: Investigators are still working to determine what led up to the shooting.

item.title: Costco’s new shopping policy officially starts Monday
item.description: Costco says a grace period is ending and the policy will take effect on Labor Day.

item.title: Suspected FSU campus shooter Phoenix Ikner gets new attorney eight weeks before trial
item.description: Accused FSU shooter Phoenix Ikner will be getting a new attorney just two months before his trial is set to begin.

item.title: Three Capybara sisters are now Suncoast celebrities
item.description: The new capybaras reside at the Suncoast Humane Society in Englewood.

item.title: 8-year-old bitten by shark while snorkeling in Key Largo
item.description: He had been snorkeling in the area when the shark struck.

item.title: Longboat Key police arrest three on various drug charges
item.description: During the stop, the officer detected the odor of marijuana.

item.title: UPDATE: Death investigation closes Sunshine Skyway Bridge South Fishing Pier
item.description: As the Florida Highway Patrol investigates a death, the South Sunshine Skyway Bridge Fishing Pier remains closed.

item.title: FHP determines ‘no shots fired’ during alleged road rage incident on I-75
item.description: The investigation found no evidence of gunfire.

item.title: Sheriff identifies man who drowned while swimming off Anna Maria Island
item.description: Witnesses told deputies the man was about 100 yards offshore.

item.title: Gabrielle likely to develop in the Atlantic
item.description: A tropical wave in the far east Atlantic has a really good chance of becoming the next named storm.
